content:
ManagedCompiler Class

In this Article

Defines the properties and methods common to managed compiler tasks.

Syntax

Declaration

public abstract class ManagedCompiler : Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ToolTaskExtension

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • Task
  • ToolTask
  • Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ToolTaskExtension
  • ManagedCompiler

Inherited Members

,

Constructors summary

ManagedCompiler()

Initializes a new instance of the ManagedCompiler class.

Properties summary

AdditionalLibPaths

Gets or sets the additional folders in which to look for assemblies.
AddModules

Gets or sets the modules for the compiler to make available to the project you are currently compiling.
CodePage

Gets or sets the code page to use for all source code files in the compilation.
DebugType

Gets or sets the debug type.
DefineConstants

Gets or sets the conditional compiler constants.
DelaySign

Gets or sets a value indicating whether the public key is placed in the assembly.
EmitDebugInformation

Gets or sets a value indicating whether the compiler generates debugging information.
FileAlignment

Gets or sets a value indicating where to align the sections of the output file.
HighEntropyVA

Gets or sets the HighEntropyVA attribute.
HostCompilerSupportsAllParameters

Gets or sets a value indicating wheter the host compilter supports all task parameters.
KeyContainer

Gets or sets the name of the cryptographic key container.
KeyFile

Gets or sets the file name containing the cryptographic key.
LinkResources

Gets or sets the .NET Framework resource files to link to the output file.
MainEntryPoint

Gets or sets the class or module that contains the main entry point.
NoConfig

Gets or sets a value indicating whether the compiler should use the default response file.
NoLogo

Gets or sets a value indicating whether to suppress the compiler banner information.
NoWin32Manifest

Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether an external UAC manifest is generated for the application.
Optimize

Gets or sets a value indicating whether to enable compiler optimizations.
OutputAssembly

Gets or sets the name of the output file.
Platform

Gets or sets the Platform attribute.
Prefer32Bit

Gets or sets the Prefer32Bit attribute.
References

Gets or sets the items from which the compiler will import public type information.
Resources

Gets or sets the .NET Framework resources to embed in the output file.
ResponseFiles

Gets or sets the response files that contain commands for the task.
Sources

Gets or sets the source files to compile.
StandardOutputEncoding

Gets or sets the encoding of the captured task standard output stream.
SubsystemVersion

Gets or sets the SubsystemVersion attribute value.
TargetType

Gets or sets the file format of the output file.
TreatWarningsAsErrors

Gets or sets a value indicating whether warnings are treated as errors.
UsedCommandLineTool

Whether the command line compiler was invoked, instead of the host object compiler.
Utf8Output

Gets or sets a value indicating whether compiler output is logged using UTF-8 encoding.
Win32Icon

Gets or sets the icon file name.
Win32Manifest

Gets or sets the Win32 manifest.
Win32Resource

Gets or sets a Win32 resource (.res) file to insert in the output file.

Methods summary

AddCommandLineCommands(CommandLineBuilderExtension)

Generates command line arguments that the command line tool must run directly from the command line and not from a response file.
AddResponseFileCommands(CommandLineBuilderExtension)

Fills the specified commandLine parameter with the switches and other information that can go into a response file.
CheckAllReferencesExistOnDisk()

Verifies that all specified references exist on disk.
CheckHostObjectSupport(String,Boolean)

Logs a message if the specified parameter is not supported by the host compiler.
HandleTaskExecutionErrors()

Handles the return code from the compiler.
ListHasNoDuplicateItems(ITaskItem[],String)

Determines if any duplicate items exist in the specified task parameter.
UseAlternateCommandLineToolToExecute()

If an alternate tool name or tool path was specified in the project file, then that tool is used rather than the host compiler for integrated development environment (IDE) builds.
ValidateParameters()

Validates the task parameters.

Constructors

  • ManagedCompiler()

    Initializes a new instance of the ManagedCompiler class.

    protected ManagedCompiler ();

Properties

  • AdditionalLibPaths

    Gets or sets the additional folders in which to look for assemblies.

    public string[] AdditionalLibPaths { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String[]

      The additional folders in which to look for assemblies.

  • AddModules

    Gets or sets the modules for the compiler to make available to the project you are currently compiling.

    public string[] AddModules { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String[]

      The modules for the compiler to make available to the project you are currently compiling.

  • CodePage

    Gets or sets the code page to use for all source code files in the compilation.

    public int CodePage { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Int32

      The code page to use for all source code files in the compilation.

  • DebugType

    Gets or sets the debug type.

    public string DebugType { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The debug type.

  • DefineConstants

    Gets or sets the conditional compiler constants.

    public string DefineConstants { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The conditional compiler constants.

  • DelaySign

    Gets or sets a value indicating whether the public key is placed in the assembly.

    public bool DelaySign { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if the public key is placed in the assembly; false if the assembly is fully signed.

  • EmitDebugInformation

    Gets or sets a value indicating whether the compiler generates debugging information.

    public bool EmitDebugInformation { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if debugging information is generated; otherwise, false;

  • FileAlignment

    Gets or sets a value indicating where to align the sections of the output file.

    public int FileAlignment { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Int32

      A value indicating where to align the sections of the output file.

  • HighEntropyVA

    Gets or sets the HighEntropyVA attribute.

    public bool HighEntropyVA { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      Returns the HighEntropyVA attribute.

  • HostCompilerSupportsAllParameters

    Gets or sets a value indicating wheter the host compilter supports all task parameters.

    protected bool HostCompilerSupportsAllParameters { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if the host compiler supports all task parameters; otherwise, false.

  • KeyContainer

    Gets or sets the name of the cryptographic key container.

    public string KeyContainer { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The name of the cryptographic key container.

  • KeyFile

    Gets or sets the file name containing the cryptographic key.

    public string KeyFile { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The file name containing the cryptographic key.

  • LinkResources

    Gets or sets the .NET Framework resource files to link to the output file.

    public Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] LinkResources { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • ITaskItem[]

      The .NET Framework resource files to link to the output file.

  • MainEntryPoint

    Gets or sets the class or module that contains the main entry point.

    public string MainEntryPoint { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The class or module that contains the main entry point.

  • NoConfig

    Gets or sets a value indicating whether the compiler should use the default response file.

    public bool NoConfig { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if the compiler is not using the default response file; otherwise, false.

  • NoLogo

    Gets or sets a value indicating whether to suppress the compiler banner information.

    public bool NoLogo { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true to suppress the compiler banner information; otherwise, false.

  • NoWin32Manifest

    Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether an external UAC manifest is generated for the application.

    public bool NoWin32Manifest { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if an external UAC manifest is generated for the application; otherwise, false.

  • Optimize

    Gets or sets a value indicating whether to enable compiler optimizations.

    public bool Optimize { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true to enable compiler optimizations; otherwise, false.

  • OutputAssembly

    Gets or sets the name of the output file.

    public Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem OutputAssembly { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • ITaskItem

      The name of the output file.

  • Platform

    Gets or sets the Platform attribute.

    public string Platform { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      Returns the Platform attribute.

  • Prefer32Bit

    Gets or sets the Prefer32Bit attribute.

    public bool Prefer32Bit { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      Returns the Prefer32Bit attribute.

  • References

    Gets or sets the items from which the compiler will import public type information.

    public Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] References { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • ITaskItem[]

      The items from which the compiler will import public type information.

  • Resources

    Gets or sets the .NET Framework resources to embed in the output file.

    public Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] Resources { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • ITaskItem[]

      The .NET Framework resources to embed in the output file.

  • ResponseFiles

    Gets or sets the response files that contain commands for the task.

    public Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] ResponseFiles { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • ITaskItem[]

      The response files that contain commands for the task.

  • Sources

    Gets or sets the source files to compile.

    public Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] Sources { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • ITaskItem[]

      The source files to compile.

  • StandardOutputEncoding

    Gets or sets the encoding of the captured task standard output stream.

    protected override System.Text.Encoding StandardOutputEncoding { get; }

    Property Value

    • Encoding

      The encoding of the captured task standard output stream.

  • SubsystemVersion

    Gets or sets the SubsystemVersion attribute value.

    public string SubsystemVersion { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      Returns the subsystem version.

  • TargetType

    Gets or sets the file format of the output file.

    public string TargetType { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The file format of the output file.

  • TreatWarningsAsErrors

    Gets or sets a value indicating whether warnings are treated as errors.

    public bool TreatWarningsAsErrors { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if warnings are treated as errors; otherwise, false.

  • UsedCommandLineTool

    Whether the command line compiler was invoked, instead of the host object compiler.

    protected bool UsedCommandLineTool { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      To be added.

  • Utf8Output

    Gets or sets a value indicating whether compiler output is logged using UTF-8 encoding.

    public bool Utf8Output { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if compiler output is logged using UTF-8 encoding; otherwise, false.

  • Win32Icon

    Gets or sets the icon file name.

    public string Win32Icon { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The icon file name.

  • Win32Manifest

    Gets or sets the Win32 manifest.

    public string Win32Manifest { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The Win32 manifest.

  • Win32Resource

    Gets or sets a Win32 resource (.res) file to insert in the output file.

    public string Win32Resource { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The Win32 resource (.res) file to insert in the output file.

Methods

  • AddCommandLineCommands(CommandLineBuilderExtension)

    Generates command line arguments that the command line tool must run directly from the command line and not from a response file.

    protected override void AddCommandLineCommands (Microsoft.Build.Tasks.CommandLineBuilderExtension commandLine);

    Parameters

    • commandLine
      CommandLineBuilderExtension

      Command line builder to add arguments to.

  • AddResponseFileCommands(CommandLineBuilderExtension)

    Fills the specified commandLine parameter with the switches and other information that can go into a response file.

    protected override void AddResponseFileCommands (Microsoft.Build.Tasks.CommandLineBuilderExtension commandLine);

    Parameters

    • commandLine
      CommandLineBuilderExtension

      Command line builder to add arguments to.

  • CheckAllReferencesExistOnDisk()

    Verifies that all specified references exist on disk.

    protected bool CheckAllReferencesExistOnDisk ();

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if all references exist on disk; otherwise, false.

  • CheckHostObjectSupport(String,Boolean)

    Logs a message if the specified parameter is not supported by the host compiler.

    protected void CheckHostObjectSupport (string parameterName, bool resultFromHostObjectSetOperation);

    Parameters

    • parameterName
      String

      The parameter name to set on the host compiler.

    • resultFromHostObjectSetOperation
      Boolean

      true if the host compiler supports parameterName; otherwise, false

  • HandleTaskExecutionErrors()

    Handles the return code from the compiler.

    protected override bool HandleTaskExecutionErrors ();

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if the return code was handled successfully; otherwise, false.

    Remarks

    This method always returns false.

  • ListHasNoDuplicateItems(ITaskItem[],String)

    Determines if any duplicate items exist in the specified task parameter.

    protected bool ListHasNoDuplicateItems (Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] itemList, string parameterName);

    Parameters

    • itemList
      ITaskItem[]

      The list of items to examine for duplicates.

    • parameterName
      String

      The name of the parameter that contains the itemList.

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if the item list contains no duplicates; otherwise, false.

  • UseAlternateCommandLineToolToExecute()

    If an alternate tool name or tool path was specified in the project file, then that tool is used rather than the host compiler for integrated development environment (IDE) builds.

    protected virtual bool UseAlternateCommandLineToolToExecute ();

    Returns

    • Boolean

      false if the host compiler should be used; otherwise, true.

  • ValidateParameters()

    Validates the task parameters.

    protected override bool ValidateParameters ();

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if all parameters are valid; otherwise, false.
